overview: Donna and her girlfriends are into role-play and fantasy. In their latest sex-capade they take on a shifty surgeon and the DMV. They send operatives and associates to sex-up and trap the evil doctor and his cheating wife. Donna and her play pals screw the doc and save the day by using their brains and bodies to turn the normal men into objects and the girl-next-door into a sex machine. It's role-play and fantasy. Join in, everybody's doing it!
title: Kiss Me Deadly
